### About Me

I am a first year PhD student in Health Policy with a concentration in Methods for Policy Research at Harvard University. My research interests are at the intersection of social policy, population health, and health services research with a focus on mental health and maternal & infant health.

Previously, I was a Pre-Doctoral Statistical Programmer Analyst in the Dept. of Health Policy & Management and Center for Mental Health & Addiction Policy at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.
